attributes.action: scrap the abolition of the 10% tax band to all pensioners
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The abolition of the 10% tax band will cause huge hardship to poor families and pensioners.If your income is below £18,000 a year your tax liability will double.You will have no chance of enjoying the new 20% lower tax band.This means the poorest of society will shoulder a much higher ratio of tax than those better off

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "scrap the abolition of the 10% tax band to all pensioners."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page16458
